The stability conditions for a solution of $-\Delta u = f(u)$ are given by the inequality:

\[ \int f'(u) \psi^2 \le \int | \nabla \psi|^2, \quad \forall \psi \in C_c^2 \]

where $f'(u)$ is the derivative of the non-linearity function $f(u)$, and $C_c^2$ is the set of $C^2$ functions defined on ${\mathbb{R}}^N$ with compact support.
